statements: SELECT * FROM robot_control_system_updates;
SELECT update_name, release_date FROM robot_control_system_updates;
SELECT update_name, update_description FROM robot_control_system_updates WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT update_id, update_version FROM robot_control_system_updates ORDER BY update_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT update_version FROM robot_control_system_updates;
SELECT * FROM robot_control_system_updates WHERE update_version = '1.0';
SELECT update_name, release_date FROM robot_control_system_updates WHERE update_id = 5;
SELECT update_name, update_description FROM robot_control_system_updates WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM robot_control_system_updates WHERE update_version IN ('1.0', '1.1', '1.2');
SELECT update_name, update_version, release_date FROM robot_control_system_updates ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT update_name, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE update_date > '2021-09-01';
SELECT patch_name, patch_version FROM patches WHERE patch_version = '1.0';
SELECT update_name, update_date, description FROM software_updates WHERE update_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM software_updates JOIN patches ON software_updates.update_id = patches.update_id;
SELECT update_name, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE update_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT patch_name, patch_version, patch_date FROM patches WHERE patch_version LIKE 'v%' AND patch_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY patch_date ASC;
SELECT update_id, update_name, update_date, description FROM software_updates LEFT JOIN patches ON software_updates.update_id = patches.update_id;
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT update_version, update_date FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_status = 'Applied';
SELECT patch_version, patch_description FROM patches WHERE patch_id > 3 ORDER BY patch_id ASC;
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM robotic_systems WHERE system_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT update_version, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE update_version LIKE '%v1%' AND update_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_status = 'Applied' ORDER BY patch_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patch_id, patch_version, patch_status FROM patches WHERE patch_version IN ('v1.5', 'v2.0') AND patch_status = 'Pending';
SELECT system_id, system_name, system_type FROM robotic_systems WHERE system_status = 'Active' ORDER BY system_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT version, description FROM software_updates WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT robot_name, manufacture_date FROM robots ORDER BY manufacture_date DESC;
SELECT patch_name, patch_description FROM patches WHERE patch_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT robot_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM robot_logs WHERE robot_id = 123 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE version LIKE '%v1%' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT software_updates.version, patches.patch_name FROM software_updates JOIN patches ON software_updates.update_id = patches.update_id WHERE software_updates.release_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, manufacture_date FROM robots WHERE DATE(manufacture_date) > DATE('2021-06-30') ORDER BY robot_name ASC;

SELECT r.robot_name, rl.log_timestamp, rl.log_message FROM robots r JOIN robot_logs rl ON r.robot_id = rl.robot_id WHERE DATE(rl.log_timestamp) BETWEEN DATE('2021-01-01') AND DATE('2021-12-31') ORDER BY rl.log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT s.update_id, s.version, p.patch_name, p.patch_description FROM software_updates s LEFT JOIN patches p ON s.update_id = p.update_id ORDER BY s.version ASC, p.patch_name DESC;
SELECT id, update_name, update_description, update_date FROM software_updates;
SELECT patch_name, patch_description, patch_date FROM patches;
SELECT system_name, system_type, installation_date FROM robotic_systems;

SELECT u.update_name, u.update_date, r.system_name, r.installation_date, ul.update_status FROM software_updates u LEFT JOIN update_logs ul ON u.id = ul.update_id LEFT JOIN robotic_systems r ON ul.system_id = r.id;
SELECT p.patch_name, p.patch_date, r.system_name, r.installation_date, pl.patch_status FROM patches p LEFT JOIN patch_logs pl ON p.id = pl.patch_id LEFT JOIN robotic_systems r ON pl.system_id = r.id;
SELECT * FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT update_name, update_description FROM software_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY update_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT system_name, system_type, installation_date FROM robotic_systems WHERE system_type = 'Industrial' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT patch_name, patch_description, patch_date FROM patches WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT ul.update_id, sl.system_id, ul.update_status, ul.update_timestamp FROM update_logs ul JOIN patch_logs pl ON ul.update_id = pl.patch_id WHERE ul.update_status = 'Success' AND pl.patch_status = 'Success' ORDER BY ul.update_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
